nodes.text: Redge Dunlak was a male Human who worked as a Podracing official during the waning years of the Republic Classic era.
In 32 BBY, he was wanted for tampering with Hutt-owned pods prior to last year's Boonta Eve Podrace. He was captured by the bounty hunter Jango Fett who claimed the bounty on his head.
Redge Dunlak' bounty is 2,400 credits alive and 1,200 credits dead. When the player highlights Redge Dunlak with the ID Scanner Boonta Eve is mistakenly spelt "Boont's Eve"
